name: Tri-Do (LUDO Recreation)
description:
APK Format is available for the play. Download and game.

Ludo, a classic roll based game has now been recreated. Enjoy the ultimate game of varied and well defined new systemic scene. Tri-do. Got 1 player less for ludo? we got your back. you can enjoy this play with only 3 players. 1 more less? again we got your back covered. 

Created with Unity in 3days. 

With a mobile-based background having handles for 2 and 3 players. A new approach for the classical Ludo.
